types.name: Query
types.description: The query root of our GraphQL schema. Start here if you want to read data.

fields.name: user
fields.description: Get a user by ID.

fields.name: action
fields.description: Get an Action by ID.

fields.name: actions
fields.description: Get collection of Actions by Campaign ID.

fields.name: campaign
fields.description: Get a campaign by ID.

fields.name: campaigns
fields.description: Get a list of campaigns.

args.name: internalTitle
args.description: The internal title to load campaigns for.

args.name: page
args.description: The page of results to return.

args.name: isOpen
args.description: Only return campaigns that are open or closed.

args.name: orderBy
args.description: How to order the results (e.g. 'id,desc').

args.name: count
args.description: The number of results per page.

fields.name: paginatedCampaigns
fields.description: Experimental: Get a Relay-style paginated collection of campaigns.

args.name: first
args.description: Get the first N results.

args.name: after
args.description: The cursor to return results after.

args.name: isOpen
args.description: Only return campaigns that are open or closed.

args.name: orderBy
args.description: How to order the results (e.g. 'id,desc').

fields.name: post
fields.description: Get a post by ID.

args.name: id
args.description: The desired post ID.

fields.name: posts
fields.description: Get a list of posts.

args.name: action
args.description: The action name to load posts for.

args.name: actionIds
args.description: The action IDs to load posts for.

args.name: campaignId
args.description: The campaign ID to load posts for.

args.name: signupId
args.description: The signup ID to load posts for.

args.name: location
args.description: The location to load posts for.

args.name: status
args.description: The post status to load posts for.

args.name: source
args.description: The post source to load posts for.

args.name: tags
args.description: The tags to load posts for.

args.name: type
args.description: The type name to load posts for.

args.name: userId
args.description: The user ID to load posts for.

args.name: page
args.description: The page of results to return.

args.name: count
args.description: The number of results per page.

fields.name: paginatedPosts
fields.description: Get a paginated collection of posts.

args.name: action
args.description: The action name to load posts for.

args.name: actionIds
args.description: The action IDs to load posts for.

args.name: campaignId
args.description: The campaign ID to load posts for.

args.name: signupId
args.description: The signup ID to load posts for.

args.name: location
args.description: The location to load posts for.

args.name: status
args.description: The post status to load posts for.

args.name: source
args.description: The post source to load posts for.

args.name: tags
args.description: The tags to load posts for.

args.name: type
args.description: The type name to load posts for.

args.name: userId
args.description: The user ID to load posts for.

args.name: first
args.description: Get the first N results.

args.name: after
args.description: The cursor to return results after.

fields.name: postsByCampaignId
fields.description: Get a paginated collection of posts by campaign ID.

args.name: id
args.description: The campaign ID to load.

args.name: page
args.description: The page of results to return.

args.name: count
args.description: The number of results per page.

fields.name: postsByUserId
fields.description: Get a paginated collection of posts by user ID.

args.name: id
args.description: The Northstar user ID to filter posts by.

args.name: page
args.description: The page of results to return.

args.name: count
args.description: The number of results per page.

args.name: schoolId
args.description: The School ID to filter school action stats by.

args.name: actionId
args.description: The Action ID to filter school action stats by.

args.name: orderBy
args.description: How to order the results (e.g. 'id,desc').

fields.name: signup
fields.description: Get a signup by ID.

fields.name: signups
fields.description: Get a paginated collection of signups.

args.name: campaignId
args.description: The Campaign ID load signups for.

args.name: source
args.description: The signup source to load signups for.

args.name: userId
args.description: The user ID to load signups for.

args.name: page
args.description: The page of results to return.

args.name: count
args.description: The number of results per page.

args.name: orderBy
args.description: How to order the results (e.g. 'id,desc').

fields.name: signupsByUserId
fields.description: Get a paginated collection of signups by user ID.

args.name: id
args.description: The Northstar user ID to filter signups by.

args.name: page
args.description: The page of results to return.

args.name: count
args.description: The number of results per page.

args.name: orderBy
args.description: How to order the results (e.g. 'id,desc').

fields.name: signupsCount
fields.description: Find out how many signups a particular user has. Intended for use with badges.

args.name: campaignId
args.description: The Campaign ID count signups for.

args.name: source
args.description: The signup source to count signups for.

args.name: userId
args.description: The user ID to count signups for.

args.name: limit
args.description: # The maximum count to report.

fields.name: postsCount
fields.description: Get post counts.

args.name: action
args.description: The action name to count posts for.

args.name: actionIds
args.description: The action IDs to count posts for.

args.name: campaignId
args.description: # The campaign ID to count posts for.

args.name: location
args.description: The location to count posts for.

args.name: source
args.description: # The post source to count posts for.

args.name: type
args.description: # The type name to count posts for.

args.name: userId
args.description: # The user ID to count posts for.

args.name: tags
args.description: A comma-separated list of tags to filter by.

args.name: limit
args.description: # The maximum count to report.

fields.name: block
fields.description: Get a block by ID.

fields.name: asset
fields.description: Get an asset by ID.

fields.name: broadcast
fields.description: Get a broadcast by ID.

fields.name: conversationTriggers
fields.description: Get all conversation triggers.

fields.name: topic
fields.description: Get a topic by ID.

fields.name: webSignupConfirmations
fields.description: Get all web signup confirmations.

fields.name: conversation
fields.description: Get a conversation by ID.

fields.name: conversations
fields.description: Get a paginated collection of conversations.

args.name: page
args.description: The page of results to return.

args.name: count
args.description: The number of results per page.

fields.name: conversationsByUserId
fields.description: Get a paginated collection of conversations by user ID.

args.name: id
args.description: The user ID to filter conversations by.

args.name: page
args.description: The page of results to return.

args.name: count
args.description: The number of results per page.

fields.name: message
fields.description: Get a message by ID.

fields.name: messages
fields.description: Get a paginated collection of messages.

args.name: page
args.description: The page of results to return.

args.name: count
args.description: The number of results per page.

fields.name: messagesByConversationId
fields.description: Get a paginated collection of messages by conversation ID.

args.name: id
args.description: The conversation ID to filter messages by.

args.name: page
args.description: The page of results to return.

args.name: count
args.description: The number of results per page.

fields.name: school
fields.description: Get a school by ID.

fields.name: searchSchools
fields.description: Search schools by state and name.

args.name: state
args.description: The school state to filter by.

args.name: name
args.description: The school name to search for.

types.name: AbsoluteUrl
types.description: A valid absolute URL string starting with either a valid protocol or a leading www

types.name: Embed
types.description: Embedded metadata for a given URL.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The resource type.

fields.name: title
fields.description: A text title, describing the resource.

fields.name: authorName
fields.description: The name of the author/owner of the resource.

fields.name: description
fields.description: The metatag description for a link.

fields.name: authorUrl
fields.description: A URL for the author/owner of the resource.

fields.name: providerName
fields.description: The name of the resource provider.

fields.name: providerUrl
fields.description: The URL of the resource provider.

fields.name: thumbnailUrl
fields.description: A URL to a thumbnail image representing the resource.

fields.name: thumbnailWidth
fields.description: The width of the optional thumbnail.

fields.name: thumbnailHeight
fields.description: The height of the optional thumbnail.

fields.name: url
fields.description: For photo embeds, the source URL of the image.

fields.name: height
fields.description: The width in pixels of the video, image, or rich embed.

fields.name: width
fields.description: The height in pixels of the video, image, or rich embed.

fields.name: html
fields.description:
The HTML required to display the resource. Provided for video or rich embeds.
Consumers may wish to load the HTML in an off-domain iframe to avoid XSS
vulnerabilities.

enumValues.name: PHOTO
enumValues.description: This type is used for representing static photos.

enumValues.name: VIDEO
enumValues.description: This type is used for representing playable videos.

enumValues.name: LINK
enumValues.description:
Responses of this type allow a provider to return any generic embed data,
without providing either the url or html parameters.

enumValues.name: RICH
enumValues.description: This type is used for rich HTML content that does not fall under one of the other categories.

types.name: String
types.description: The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

types.name: Int
types.description: The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

types.name: User
types.description: A DoSomething.org user profile.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The user's Northstar ID.

fields.name: displayName
fields.description: The user's display name is their first name and (if set) last initial.

fields.name: firstName
fields.description: The user's first name.

fields.name: lastName
fields.description: The user's last name. **This field contains personally-identifiable information, and access will be logged.**

fields.name: lastInitial
fields.description: The user's last initial.

fields.name: email
fields.description: The user's email address. **This field contains personally-identifiable information, and access will be logged.**

fields.name: emailPreview
fields.description: A preview of the user's email address.

fields.name: mobile
fields.description: The user's mobile number. **This field contains personally-identifiable information, and access will be logged.**

fields.name: mobilePreview
fields.description: A preview of the user's mobile number.

fields.name: age
fields.description: The user's age.

fields.name: birthdate
fields.description:
The user's birthdate, formatted YYYY-MM-DD. **This field contains
personally-identifiable information, and access will be logged.**

fields.name: addrStreet1
fields.description:
The user's street address. Null if unauthorized. **This field contains
personally-identifiable information, and access will be logged.**

fields.name: addrStreet2
fields.description:
The user's extended street address (for example, apartment number). Null if
unauthorized. **This field contains personally-identifiable information, and
access will be logged.**

fields.name: addrCity
fields.description: The user's city. Null if unauthorized.

fields.name: addrState
fields.description: The user's state. Null if unauthorized.

fields.name: addrZip
fields.description: The user's 6-digit zip code. Null if unauthorized.

fields.name: source
fields.description: The user's registration source. This is often a Northstar OAuth client.

fields.name: sourceDetail
fields.description: More information about the user's registration source (for example, a campaign or broadcast ID).

fields.name: emailSubscriptionStatus
fields.description: The user's email subscription status.

fields.name: emailSubscriptionTopics
fields.description: The user's email subscription status.

fields.name: smsStatus
fields.description: The user's SMS status.

fields.name: smsPaused
fields.description: The user's conversation status will be paused if they are in a support conversation.

fields.name: language
fields.description: The user's language, as reported by their browser when they registered.

fields.name: country
fields.description: The user's ISO-3166  country code.

fields.name: role
fields.description: The user's role.

fields.name: schoolId
fields.description: The user's current School ID **This field contains personally-identifiable information, and access will be logged.**

fields.name: voterRegistrationStatus
fields.description: The user's voter registration status, either self-reported or by registering with TurboVote.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: The time this user was created. See the 'source' and 'source_detail' field for details.

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: The last modified time for this user account.

fields.name: lastAccessedAt
fields.description: The last time this user visited DoSomething.org on the web (accurate within an hour).

fields.name: lastAuthenticatedAt
fields.description: The last time this user logged-in to DoSomething.org with their username & password.

fields.name: lastMessagedAt
fields.description: The last time this user messaged DoSomething.org via Gambit.

fields.name: votingPlanStatus
fields.description: Whether user plans to vote in upcoming election (e.g. 'voting', 'voted', 'not_sure')

fields.name: votingPlanAttendingWith
fields.description: Who user plans to attend polls with to vote in upcoming election.

fields.name: votingPlanMethodOfTransport
fields.description: How user plans to get to the polls to vote in upcoming election.

fields.name: votingPlanTimeOfDay
fields.description: What time of day user plans to get the polls to vote in upcoming election.

fields.name: hasFeatureFlag
fields.description: Whether or not the user is opted-in to the given feature.

fields.name: permalink
fields.description: The permalink to this user's profile in Aurora.

fields.name: posts
fields.description: The posts created by this user.

fields.name: signups
fields.description: The signups created by this user.

fields.name: conversations
fields.description: The conversations created by this user.

fields.name: school
fields.description: The user's current school. Note -- only works if user.schoolId is also returned

types.name: Date
types.description:
A date string, such as 2007-12-03, compliant with the `full-date` format
outlined in section 5.6 of the RFC 3339 profile of the ISO 8601 standard for
representation of dates and times using the Gregorian calendar.

types.name: Boolean
types.description: The `Boolean` scalar type represents `true` or `false`.

types.name: SubscriptionStatus
types.description: The user's SMS subscription status.

enumValues.name: ACTIVE
enumValues.description: User is actively subscribed to messaging.

enumValues.name: LESS
enumValues.description: User has requested to receive fewer broadcasts.

enumValues.name: STOP
enumValues.description: User has texted STOP to unsubscribe from messaging.

enumValues.name: UNDELIVERABLE
enumValues.description: The mobile number is invalid, cannot receive texts, or texted STOP in the past.

enumValues.name: UNKNOWN
enumValues.description: An unknown issue exists with this user's SMS subscription.

enumValues.name: PENDING
enumValues.description: User has received an askSubscriptionStatus broadcast but never answered with valid preference.

types.name: Role
types.description: The user's role defines their abilities on any DoSomething.org site.

types.name: DateTime
types.description:
A date-time string at UTC, such as 2007-12-03T10:15:30Z, compliant with the
`date-time` format outlined in section 5.6 of the RFC 3339 profile of the ISO
8601 standard for representation of dates and times using the Gregorian calendar.

types.name: Post
types.description: A user's post on a campaign.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique ID for this post.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of action (e.g. 'photo', 'voterReg', or 'text').

fields.name: action
fields.description: The specific action being performed (or 'default' on a single-action campaign).

fields.name: actionDetails
fields.description: The specific action being performed.

fields.name: userId
fields.description: The Northstar user ID of the user who created this post.

fields.name: campaignId
fields.description: The Rogue campaign ID this post was made for.

fields.name: campaign
fields.description: The Rogue campaign this post was made for.

fields.name: location
fields.description: The location this post was submitted from. This is provided by Fastly geo-location headers on the web.

fields.name: media
fields.description: The attached media for this post.

fields.name: url
fields.description: The image URL.

args.name: w
args.description: The desired image width, in pixels.

args.name: h
args.description: The desired image height, in pixels.

fields.name: text
fields.description: The text content of the post, provided by the user.

fields.name: signupId
fields.description: The ID of the associated signup for this post.

fields.name: signup
fields.description: The associated signup for this post.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The review status of the post.

fields.name: source
fields.description: The source of this post. This is often a Northstar OAuth client.

fields.name: quantity
fields.description: The number of items added or removed in this post.

fields.name: impact
fields.description: The human-readable impact (quantity, noun, and verb).

fields.name: tags
fields.description: The tags that have been applied to this post by DoSomething.org staffers.

fields.name: reactions
fields.description: The total number of reactions to this post.

fields.name: reacted
fields.description: Has the current user reacted to this post?

fields.name: schoolId
fields.description: The ID of the associated school for this post.

fields.name: remoteAddr
fields.description: The IP address this post was created from.
fields.deprecationReason: This field is no longer stored.

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: The time this post was last modified.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: The time when this post was originally created.

fields.name: permalink
fields.description: Permalink to Admin view.

fields.name: deleted
fields.description: This flag is set when a post has been deleted. On subsequent queries, this post will be null.

fields.name: user
fields.description: The user who created this post.

fields.name: school
fields.description: The school associated with the post. Note -- only works if post.schoolId is also returned

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique ID for this action.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The internal name for this action.

fields.name: actionLabel
fields.description: The readable name of this action's type.

fields.name: actionType
fields.description: The machine name of this action's type.

fields.name: reportback
fields.description: Does this action count as a reportback?

fields.name: callpowerCampaignId
fields.description: Callpower Campaign ID this action belongs to

fields.name: campaignId
fields.description: Campaign ID this action belongs to

fields.name: campaign
fields.description: Campaign this action belongs to

fields.name: civicAction
fields.description: Does this action count as a civic action?

fields.name: online
fields.description: Is this an online action?

fields.name: postLabel
fields.description: The readable name of post type this action should create.

fields.name: postType
fields.description: The machine name of the post type this action should create.

fields.name: quiz
fields.description: Is this action a quiz?

fields.name: scholarshipEntry
fields.description: Does this action count as a scholarship entry?

fields.name: collectSchoolId
fields.description: Does this action associate user posts with their school?

fields.name: anonymous
fields.description: Anonymous actions will not be attributed to a particular user in public galleries.

fields.name: noun
fields.description: The noun for this action, e.g. 'cards' or 'jeans'.

fields.name: verb
fields.description: The verb for this action, e.g. 'donated' or 'created'.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: The time when this action was originally created.

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: The time when this action was last modified.

fields.name: timeCommitmentLabel
fields.description: How long will this action take to complete?

fields.name: schoolActionStats
fields.description: Aggregate post information for this action by school.

args.name: schoolId
args.description: The school ID to display an action stat for.

args.name: orderBy
args.description: How to order the results (e.g. 'accepted_quantity,desc').

types.name: Campaign
types.description: A campaign.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: The time when this campaign was originally created.

fields.name: endDate
fields.description: The time when this campaign ends.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique ID for this campaign.

fields.name: internalTitle
fields.description: The internal name used to identify the campaign.

fields.name: actions
fields.description: Collection of Actions associated to the Campaign.

fields.name: causes
fields.description: The cause-spaces for this campaign.

fields.name: impactDoc
fields.description: The internal documentation used for campaign proof of impact.

fields.name: isOpen
fields.description: Is this campaign open?

fields.name: pendingCount
fields.description: The number of posts pending review. Only visible by staff/admins.

fields.name: acceptedCount
fields.description: The number of accepted posts.

fields.name: startDate
fields.description: The time when this campaign starts.

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: The time when this campaign last modified.

types.name: Cause
types.description: A cause space.

types.name: SchoolActionStat
types.description: A set of aggregate post information for a school and action.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique ID for this school action stat.

fields.name: schoolId
fields.description: The school ID this stat belongs to

fields.name: actionId
fields.description: The action ID this stat belongs to.

fields.name: action
fields.description: The action this stat belongs to.

fields.name: acceptedQuantity
fields.description: The sum quantity of all accepted posts with school and action.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: The first time a post for school and action was reviewed.

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: The last time a post for school and action was reviewed.

fields.name: school
fields.description: The school that this school action stat is for.

types.name: School
types.description: A school.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The school ID.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The school name.

fields.name: city
fields.description: The school city.

fields.name: state
fields.description: The school state.

fields.name: schoolActionStats
fields.description: Aggregate post information for this school by action.

args.name: actionId
args.description: The action ID to show a school action stat for.

args.name: orderBy
args.description: How to order the results (e.g. 'id,desc').

enumValues.name: ISO_FORMAT
enumValues.description: Machine-readable ISO-3166-2 format (e.g. US-NY)

enumValues.name: HUMAN_FORMAT
enumValues.description: Human-readable location name.

types.name: Media
types.description: A media resource on a post.

fields.name: url
fields.description: The image URL.

args.name: w
args.description: The desired image width, in pixels.

args.name: h
args.description: The desired image height, in pixels.

fields.name: text
fields.description: The text content of the post, provided by the user.

types.name: Signup
types.description: A user's signup for a campaign.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique ID for this signup.

fields.name: posts
fields.description: The associated posts made under this signup.

fields.name: campaign
fields.description: The associated campaign for this signup.

fields.name: campaignId
fields.description: The Rogue campaign ID this post was made for.

fields.name: campaignRunId
fields.description: The Drupal campaign run ID this signup was made for.
fields.deprecationReason: We no longer stored campaign run IDs.

fields.name: userId
fields.description: The Northstar ID of the user who created this signup.

fields.name: quantity
fields.description: The total number of items on all posts attached to this signup.

fields.name: whyParticipated
fields.description: The user's self-reported reason for doing this campaign.

fields.name: source
fields.description: The source application of this signup (e.g. sms, phoenix-next)

fields.name: sourceDetails
fields.description: Additional source details (e.g. page or broadcast ID)

fields.name: details
fields.description: More information about the signup (for example, third-party messaging opt-ins).

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: The time this signup was last modified.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: The time when this signup was originally created.

fields.name: permalink
fields.description: Permalink to Admin view.

fields.name: deleted
fields.description: This flag is set when a signup has been deleted. On subsequent queries, this signup will be null.

fields.name: user
fields.description: The user who created this signup.

types.name: ReviewStatus
types.description: Posts are reviewed by DoSomething.org staff for content.

types.name: Conversation
types.description: A DoSomething.org user conversation.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The conversation ID.

fields.name: userId
fields.description: The Northstar user ID of the user this conversation is with.

fields.name: platform
fields.description: The conversation platform (e.g. 'sms', 'gambit-slack').

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: The time when this conversation was originally created.

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: The time this conversation was last modified.

fields.name: topicId
fields.description: The topic ID of current conversation topic.

fields.name: messages
fields.description: The messages in this conversation.

fields.name: user
fields.description: The user this conversation is with.

fields.name: topic
fields.description: The current topic of the conversation.

types.name: Message
types.description: A conversation message.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The message ID.

fields.name: direction
fields.description: The message direction.

fields.name: userId
fields.description: The user ID this message is from or to.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: The time when this conversation was originally created.

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: The time this conversation was last modified.

fields.name: topicId
fields.description: The topic ID of the conversation topic when message was created.

fields.name: template
fields.description: The message template (if outbound).

fields.name: match
fields.description: The Rivescript trigger that was matched.

fields.name: user
fields.description: The user this message was sent to or from (depending on message direction).

fields.name: topic
fields.description: The topic that conversation was set to when the message was created.

types.name: Topic
types.description: A DoSomething.org conversation topic.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The entry ID.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The entry name.

fields.name: contentType
fields.description: The entry content type (e.g. 'photoPostConfig', 'askYesNo').

types.name: CampaignCollection
types.description:
Experimental: A paginated list of campaigns. This is a 'Connection' in Relay's
parlance, and follows the [Relay Cursor Connections](https://dfurn.es/338oQ6i) specification.

types.name: CampaignEdge
types.description: Experimental: Campaign in a paginated list.

types.name: PageInfo
types.description: Experimental: Information about a paginated list.

types.name: PostCollection
types.description:
Experimental: A paginated list of posts. This is a 'Connection' in Relay's
parlance, and follows the [Relay Cursor Connections](https://dfurn.es/338oQ6i) specification.

types.name: PostEdge
types.description: Experimental: Post in a paginated list.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The Contentful ID for this block.

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: The time this entry was last modified.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: The time when this entry was originally created.

fields.name: id

enumValues.name: PAD
enumValues.description: Resize the image to the specified dimensions, padding the image if needed.

enumValues.name: FILL
enumValues.description: Resize the image to the specified dimensions, cropping the image if needed.

enumValues.name: SCALE
enumValues.description: Resize the image to the specified dimensions, changing the original aspect ratio if needed.

enumValues.name: CROP
enumValues.description: Crop a part of the original image to fit into the specified dimensions.

enumValues.name: THUMB
enumValues.description: Create a thumbnail from the image.

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Schema defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, as well as the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: A list of all directives supported by this server.

types.name: __Type
types.description:
The fundamental unit of any GraphQL Schema is the type. There are many kinds of types in GraphQL as represented by the `__TypeKind` enum.

Depending on the kind of a type, certain fields describe information about that type. Scalar types provide no information beyond a name and description, while Enum types provide their values. Object and Interface types provide the fields they describe. Abstract types, Union and Interface, provide the Object types possible at runtime. List and NonNull types compose other types.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given `__Type` is.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `interfaces` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields` and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.

types.name: __Field
types.description: Object and Interface types are described by a list of Fields, each of which has a name, potentially a list of arguments, and a return type.

types.name: __InputValue
types.description: Arguments provided to Fields or Directives and the input fields of an InputObject are represented as Input Values which describe their type and optionally a default value.

fields.name: defaultValue
fields.description: A GraphQL-formatted string representing the default value for this input value.

types.name: __EnumValue
types.description: One possible value for a given Enum. Enum values are unique values, not a placeholder for a string or numeric value. However an Enum value is returned in a JSON response as a string.

types.name: __Directive
types.description:
A Directive provides a way to describe alternate runtime execution and type validation behavior in a GraphQL document.

In some cases, you need to provide options to alter GraphQL's execution behavior in ways field arguments will not suffice, such as conditionally including or skipping a field. Directives provide this by describing additional information to the executor.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: A Directive can be adjacent to many parts of the GraphQL language, a __DirectiveLocation describes one such possible adjacencies.

enumValues.name: QUERY
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a query operation.

enumValues.name: MUTATION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a mutation operation.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a subscription operation.

enumValues.name: FIELD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment definition.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_SPREAD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment spread.

enumValues.name: INLINE_FRAGMENT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an inline fragment.

enumValues.name: VARIABLE_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a variable definition.

enumValues.name: SCHEMA
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a schema definition.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a scalar definition.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an object type definition.

enumValues.name: FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field definition.

enumValues.name: ARGUMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an argument definition.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an interface definition.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a union definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM_VALUE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum value definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object type definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object field definition.

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the `if` argument is true.

args.name: if
args.description: Skipped when true.

directives.name: include
directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the `if` argument is true.

args.name: if
args.description: Included when true.

directives.name: deprecated
directives.description: Marks an element of a GraphQL schema as no longer supported.

args.name: reason
args.description: Explains why this element was deprecated, usually also including a suggestion for how to access supported similar data. Formatted using the Markdown syntax (as specified by [CommonMark](https://commonmark.org/).

directives.name: client
directives.description: Direct the client to resolve this field locally, either from the cache or local resolvers.

args.name: always
args.description:
When true, the client will never use the cache for this value. See
https://www.apollographql.com/docs/react/essentials/local-state/#forcing-resolvers-with-clientalways-true

directives.name: export
directives.description:
Export this locally resolved field as a variable to be used in the remainder of this query. See
https://www.apollographql.com/docs/react/essentials/local-state/#using-client-fields-as-variables

args.name: as
args.description: The variable name to export this field as.

directives.name: connection
directives.description:
Specify a custom store key for this result. See
https://www.apollographql.com/docs/react/advanced/caching/#the-connection-directive

args.name: key
args.description: Specify the store key.

args.name: filter
args.description: An array of query argument names to include in the generated custom store key.
